individualIntro: Clarity. Change. Performance. Individual sessions are deep-dive spaces where we explore mental, emotional, and behavioral processes to deliver concrete outcomes aligned with your rhythm and objectives.
individualSections: Coaching sessions — clarify goals, unlock performance, drive personal growth.
Executive coaching — leadership, decision-making, strategic communication, pressure management.
Life coaching — align roles, values, relationships, and personal meaning.
Hypno-coaching — guided trance for restructuring thought patterns and strengthening confidence.
Strategic intervention — advanced cognitive and emotional change techniques backed by applied psychology.
Supervision & meta-reflection — for coaches, trainers, and human-centered professionals seeking clarity.
Outcomes: sharper decisions, emotional resilience, reprogrammed limiting patterns.

individualHighlights.title: Clarity, change, performance
individualHighlights.description: Individual sessions are deep-dive spaces covering mental, emotional, and behavioral layers, calibrated to your pace and resources.

individualHighlights.title: How it works
individualHighlights.description: Duration: 60–75 minutes per session. Format: online or in-person. Frequency: set together (from weekly to customized pace). Methodology combines coaching, Ericksonian hypnosis, cognitive frameworks, and performance strategies.

individualFooter: All sessions take place in an ethical, confidential setting focused on development and optimisation, not on diagnosis or psychological treatment.
